Desc.entry: Boardroom for hire 9m x 11m, with round table seating 20. TV, DVD, Video, wipe board and flip chart, projector for computer, hot and cold drinks and buffet food if required. Hall, provides cinema style seating for capacity 60, full size snooker table, 2 pool tables and 2 table tennis tables. 4 Breakout rooms available, capacity 10 with separate kitchen. Off road car parking with CCTV security.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 8am-5pm. Available other times by arrangement.
